title: Inherited construction of porous zinc hydroxide sulfate layer for stable dendrite-free Zn anode
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00721B, Paper
Zhicheng Xiang, Yubing Qiu, Xingpeng Guo, Kai Qi, Zheng-Long Xu, Bao Yu Xia
A zinc hydroxide sulfate layer inheriting the ordered structure and porous channels of MOF was developed for high-performance Zn anodes.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
